text: @HillaryClinton If Teachers are Forced to go back to an enclosed  Environment... I'm guessing... Most will quit their Profession that they worked so hard for. The Teachers and the Staff and the Kids SHOULD NOT BE Forced to go back to work and school till we get a Handle on CoVid19...
